alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:38PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Tooele County through 830 PM MDT... At 737 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles west of Utah Test and Training Range South to 6 miles north of Dugway English Village. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Utah Test and Training Range South, Delle, Knolls, Clive, Skull Valley, Utah Test and Training Range North, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 0 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
